subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4
msgSnippet: ... Respectfully, that s your opinion.  I disagree. -- Jason Rogers I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and
messageBody:
Alexandru Popescu wrote:

>
> This is a long-discussion. TestNG is using the suite definition (xml)
> notion for this. Choosing
> which tests should be run, is an external concept than the source code.
>
Respectfully, that's your opinion. I disagree.

--
Jason Rogers

"I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I,
but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in
the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved
me, and gave himself for me."
Galatians 2:20
